"C:\Program Files\JetBrains\CLion 2025.2.4\bin\cmake\win\x64\bin\cmake.exe" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug "-DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=C:/Program Files/JetBrains/CLion 2025.2.4/bin/ninja/win/x64/ninja.exe" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=C:\Users\Jordi\.vcpkg-clion\vcpkg\scripts\buildsystems\vcpkg.cmake -DVCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET=x64-mingw-dynamic -G Ninja -S C:\Users\Jordi\OneDrive\Documentos\GitHub\TrabalhoFinalCPD\cpd -B C:\Users\Jordi\OneDrive\Documentos\GitHub\TrabalhoFinalCPD\cpd\cmake-build-debug
-- Running vcpkg install
Detecting compiler hash for triplet x64-mingw-dynamic...

The following packages are already installed:
    cjson:x64-mingw-dynamic@1.7.19
    jsoncpp:x64-mingw-dynamic@1.9.6
    nlohmann-json:x64-mingw-dynamic@3.12.0#1
    vcpkg-cmake:x64-mingw-dynamic@2024-04-23
    vcpkg-cmake-config:x64-mingw-dynamic@2024-05-23
cjson provides CMake targets:

  # this is heuristically generated, and may not be correct
  find_package(cJSON CONFIG REQUIRED)
  target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE cjson)

cjson provides pkg-config modules:

  # Ultralightweight JSON parser in ANSI C
  libcjson

jsoncpp provides CMake targets:

  # this is heuristically generated, and may not be correct
  find_package(jsoncpp CONFIG REQUIRED)
  target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE JsonCpp::JsonCpp)

jsoncpp provides pkg-config modules:

  # A C++ library for interacting with JSON
  jsoncpp

The package nlohmann-json provides CMake targets:

    find_package(nlohmann_json CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE nlohmann_json::nlohmann_json)

The package nlohmann-json can be configured to not provide implicit conversions via a custom triplet file:

    set(nlohmann-json_IMPLICIT_CONVERSIONS OFF)

For more information, see the docs here:
    
    https://json.nlohmann.me/api/macros/json_use_implicit_conversions/
